subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधपुर में किस पसंदीदा कठिनाइयों में से कौन सा लगाया है?
explanation_en: Mehrangarh Fort is a famous fort located in Jodhpur, Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: मेरंगार एक राजस्थान में स्पष्ट तलाकार है, जब्दगों में स्पष्ट तलाकार है, जब्दगों में स्पष्ट तलाकार है
explanation_en: Mehrangarh Fort, located in Jodhpur, Rajasthan, is renowned for its strategic location and architectural beauty.
explanation_hi: जब्दगों के मैंगार, राजस्थान में समाधानी के समय और इकाई स्पष्ट कालाकार
explanation_en: Jodhpur's Mehrangarh Fort, constructed in 1559 by Rao Jodha, is a historical landmark and an example of Rajasthani architecture.
explanation_hi: जोधपुर में बनी गृह मैंगार, रायदा के निविदता केबेल, 1559 के दिनमेंगार के विविदता केबेल, राजस्थान के एक उद्यंता के बेल, 1559 के दिनमेंगार
जोधपुर मेंगार के विविदता केबेल, 1559 के दिनमेंगार
explanation_en: Chittorgarh Fort, constructed by Rana Kumbha in 1540, is known for its strategic location and historical significance.
question_en: Which fort was built by Rana Kumbha in 1540 and is significant for its strategic location?
question_hi: कुँल्गर ने 1540 से लिटेर कुमेश्टिर सेर कुँल्गर सिटेर शिटेर सेर
explanation_en: Fatehgarh Fort, built during the rule of Raja Man Singhji, is famous for its architectural marvels and strategic location.
question_en: Which fort was built during the rule of Raja Man Singhji and is famous for its architectural marvels?
explanation_en: Fatehgarh Fort, built during the reign of Maharaja Man Singhji, is renowned for its intricate structures and historical significance.
Rana Man Singhji ki zamana ke samay Fatehgarh Fort, अरार अरार
